snippet: Democrats and the White House are struggling to unify while Congressional Republicans have managed to coordinate with Mitt Romney on the issues of the day.
abstract: White House and Congressional Democrats are making a push together to pass the Paycheck Fairness Act, a measure that makes it easier for women to sue over unequal pay; strategy shows how Democrats are attempting to mimic the way Republicans consistently coordinate their message with Mitt Romney's presidential campaign.
lead_paragraph: Democrats and the White House are struggling to unify while Congressional Republicans have managed to coordinate with Mitt Romney on the issues of the day.

headline.seo: Democrats Show Unity on Pay Equity Bill
headline.main: Democrats Grab a Chance to Speak With One Voice
headline.print_headline: Democrats Grab a Chance To Speak With One Voice
